name: Easy image slideshow
author: Gopi Ramasamy

sections.description:
This is a lightweight JavaScript slideshow with manual navigation option. You can use this slideshow, if you required the manual navigation image gallery.

Check official website for live demo http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2012/06/20/easy-image-slideshow-wordpress-plugin/

  • Live Demo : Live Demo
  • More Information : More Information
  • Plugin URI : Plugin URI

This is a lightweight JavaScript slideshow with manual navigation option. You can use this slideshow, if you required the manual navigation image gallery. we have tested this in all major bowers. this slideshow cache subsequent images, so we can get the even transition between image navigation. in the admin we have option to set the width and height of the images in the slideshow.

Plugin configuration

  • Drag and drop the widget
  • Paste the php code to your desired template location
  • Short code for pages and posts

Plug-in features

  • Easy to customize
  • Support all browser
  • Short code available for pages and posts.
  • Supports navigation by button.

Translators

  • French (fr_FR) – Shannon Martin
  • Polish (pl_PL) – Abdul Sattar
sections.faq:
Q1) How to arrange the width and height of the plugin?

Q2) Is possible to display different size images in the same slideshow?

Q3) Is Where to upload my images?

Answer
sections.changelog:
Version 1.0

First version

Version 2.0

Slideshow short code available for posts and pages.

Version 3.0

New demo link

Version 4.0

Tested up to 3.4.2

Version 4.1

Tested up to 3.5

Version 5.0

Tested up to 3.6
Added few security features.
New admin layout.

Version 5.1

  1. Tested up to 3.8
  2. Now this plugin supports localization (or internationalization). i.e. option to translate into other languages.
    Plugin *.po file (easy-image-slideshow.po) available in the languages folder.

Version 5.2

  1. Tested up to 3.9
  2. Small security update.
  3. Converting image name to upper case issue fixed.

Version 5.3

  1. Tested up to 4.0

Version 5.4

  1. Tested up to 4.1

Version 5.5

  1. Tested up to 4.2.2

Version 5.6

  1. Tested up to 4.3

Version 5.7

  1. Tested up to 4.4
  2. Text Domain slug has been added for Language Packs.

Version 5.8

  1. Tested up to 4.5
  2. Sanitization added for all input value.

Version 5.9

  1. Tested up to 4.6

Version 6.0

  1. Tested up to 4.7

Version 6.1

  1. Tested up to 4.8

Version 6.2

  1. Tested up to 4.9

Version 6.3

  1. Tested up to 5.1
  2. Converted JS alert message into WP class file.

Version 6.4

  1. Tested up to 5.2
  2. Uninstall option added. All plugin reference and plugin table will be cleared during uninstallation.

Version 6.5

  1. Tested up to 5.3

Version 6.6

  1. Tested up to 5.4

Version 6.7

  1. Tested up to 5.5

Version 6.8

  1. Tested up to 5.7

Version 6.9

  1. Tested up to 5.8
  2. Use plugin short code in the widget.

Version 7.0

  1. Tested up to 5.9
